title: “Mysteries and Martyrs”
description:
Jason and David break down episode 7 of Foundation, “Mysteries and Martyrs.” They discuss the concepts behind the Invictus and other Imperial spaceships—some are knife blades, others are donut holes. They also dive deep into Hari’s grand plan, Brother Day’s confrontation with Zephyr Halima, and how Brother Dawn’s storyline gives off YA vibes.

This is an Apple TV+ podcast, produced by Pineapple Street Studios.

https://apple.co/-Foundation-
